  The latest news and live updates on the active shooter alert at Emory
  University in Atlanta.

title: >-
  Emory University shooting live updates: Suspect dead, officer injured;
  lockdown lifted on Atlanta campus
---
<h2>What we know</h2>
<ul><li><strong>ACTIVE SHOOTER ALERT: </strong>Emory University sent out an active shooting alert to its Atlanta campus at 5 p.m. today. The lockdown was lifted about an hour and a half later.</li><li><strong>SUSPECT DEAD: </strong>Atlanta police said the incident involved a single shooter, who is dead. Additional information about the incident has not been released.</li><li><strong>OFFICER INJURED:</strong> A DeKalb County officer was injured and was taken to a nearby hospital, a county spokesperson said. Additional details about the nature of the officer's injuries and condition have not been released. </li><li><strong>CDC CAMPUS LOCKDOWN: </strong>The headquarters of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, about a mile from Emory's Atlanta campus, were also locked down today, according to a copy of a CDC email a source shared with NBC News. </li></ul>
<p>1m ago / 4:43 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">No civilian casualties, Atlanta mayor says</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/rebecca-cohen-ncpn1307773"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Rebecca Cohen</p></a></p>
<p>Atlanta Mayor Andre Dickens said there were no civilian casualties today.</p>
<p>One officer was injured. Dickens said an update on the officer's condition is forthcoming.</p>
<p>15m ago / 4:29 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">CDC campus remains on lockdown</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/allan-smith-ncpn925861"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_26/3653035/190618-allan-smith.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_26/3653035/190618-allan-smith.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_26/3653035/190618-allan-smith.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Allan Smith</p></a></p>
<p>The CDC campus near Emory University remains on lockdown this evening, according to an email sent from the CDC that was shared with NBC News.</p>
<p>“Emory University has given the all-clear but please remain in place until local law enforcement instructs you to do so,” the email said.</p>
<p>55m ago / 3:50 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">CVS near shooting says everyone at store is safe</h2>
<figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure>
<figure></figure><p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/phil-helsel-ncpn115631"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Phil Helsel</p></a></p>
<figure></figure><p>Anthony Cusumano</p>
<p>Phil Helsel and Anthony Cusumano</p>
<p>Pharmacy chain CVS said that no one inside the store was hurt in the shooting that occurred near its Emory Point location.</p>
<p>"We’re cooperating with the Atlanta Police Department as it investigates a shooting near our Emory Point store. All colleagues, customers and patients are safe. The store is currently closed and will reopen when the scene is cleared," a spokesperson for CVS said.</p>
<p>56m ago / 3:48 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Situation contained in Atlanta</h2>
<figure></figure><p>Juliette Arcodia</p>
<figure><picture data-flavor="fit" data-original-height="1667" data-original-width="2500" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 1000px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_fit-560w,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/rockcms/2025-08/250808-virginia-emory-university-shooting-ac-704p-51b802.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_fit-560w,f_auto,q_auto:best/rockcms/2025-08/250808-virginia-emory-university-shooting-ac-704p-51b802.jpg 1x"/><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_fit-760w,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/rockcms/2025-08/250808-virginia-emory-university-shooting-ac-704p-51b802.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_fit-760w,f_auto,q_auto:best/rockcms/2025-08/250808-virginia-emory-university-shooting-ac-704p-51b802.jpg 1x"/><img alt="Emory University Shooting" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_fit-760w,f_auto,q_auto:best/rockcms/2025-08/250808-virginia-emory-university-shooting-ac-704p-51b802.jpg"/></picture><figcaption>Emergency vehicles line up near Emory University and Centers for Disease Control and Prevention headquarters in Atlanta on Friday.</figcaption></figure>
<p>The situation in Atlanta is contained and there is no active threat to the public, a DeKalb County official said.</p>
<p>Residents of the county should remain indoors as a precaution as officials investigate the incident. The investigation is ongoing and active, the official said.</p>
<p>Lorraine Cochran-Johnson, the CEO of the county, said her thoughts and prayers are with those affected by today's event and she's grateful for the quick law enforcement response.</p>
<p>"I urge everyone to stay alert, remain indoors, and follow official guidance as we allow law enforcement to complete their investigation," Cochran-Johnson said.</p>
<p>57m ago / 3:47 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Shooting suspect is dead, Atlanta PD said</h2>
<figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_41/3665294/241010-priya-sridhar.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665294/241010-priya-sridhar.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665294/241010-priya-sridhar.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure>
<figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure>
<figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_41/3665294/241010-priya-sridhar.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665294/241010-priya-sridhar.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665294/241010-priya-sridhar.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure>
<p>Priya Sridhar</p>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/rebecca-cohen-ncpn1307773"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Rebecca Cohen</p></a></p>
<p>Priya Sridhar and Rebecca Cohen</p>
<p>A suspect in the active shooter situation on Emory University's Atlanta campus is dead, according to the Atlanta Police Department.</p>
<p>Police said there was a single shooter who is now dead, and there is no further threat to the campus or surrounding area.</p>
<p>One law enforcement officer was injured in the "course of the response," police said. It was not clear whether the officer was shot or what injuries they sustained.</p>

<p>02:36</p>
<p>1h ago / 3:40 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Sen. Warnock: 'Our community is facing yet another tragedy of gun violence' </h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/phil-helsel-ncpn115631"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Phil Helsel</p></a></p>
<p>U.S. Sen. Raphael Warnock, D-Ga., says he is praying for the injured officer and for everyone at Emory University in Atlanta.</p>
<p>“I’m monitoring the active shooter incident at Emory closely. I’m praying for the officer who was injured, and all students and faculty,” Warnock <a href="https://x.com/SenatorWarnock/status/1953943679246176609">wrote on X</a>.</p>
<p>“I am devastated that our community is facing yet another tragedy of gun violence,” he wrote.</p>
<p>1h ago / 3:40 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Emory says shelter in place is lifted</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/phil-helsel-ncpn115631"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Phil Helsel</p></a></p>
<p>Emory University said on X moments ago that the shelter-in-place order has been lifted.</p>
<p>"Emory Emergency: A police emergency continues on the Emory Atlanta Campus at Emory Point. Avoid the area. Shelter in place has been lifted," it said on X.</p>
<p>1h ago / 3:29 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Emory University is small liberal arts university near CDC </h2>
<figure></figure><p>NBC News</p>
<p>Emory University is a liberal arts research university in Atlanta near the headquarters of the CDC.</p>
<p>Students and staff at Emory University, which has enrollment of 5,727, were told this afternoon, “Emory Emergency: Active shooter on Emory Atlanta Campus at Emory Point CVS. RUN, HIDE, FIGHT.”</p>
<p>The CDC sent an email to staff advising them to take shelter, according to a copy of an email shared with NBC News.</p>
<p>1h ago / 3:23 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">App warned of ‘active shooter’ at Emory</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/phil-helsel-ncpn115631"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_16/3645833/230208-phil-helsel-headshots-14-mjf.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Phil Helsel</p></a></p>
<p>A worker at Emory said a university phone app alerted him that there was an incident on campus and that he needed to take action.</p>
<p>“It was saying there was an active shooter and that we needed to, you know, hide. Find somewhere safe,” the university employee told NBC affiliate WXIA of Atlanta in a phone interview.</p>
<p>“Immediately, I just go into the nearest building I can,” he said.</p>
<p>The university employee didn’t hear any gunshots but heard helicopters and the massive police response.</p>
<p>“I’m just trying to be safe, you know, while I’m out here. Because it’s a lot going on — I have co-workers that don’t really want to be here anymore, they want to go home, they don’t feel safe,” he said. “So, it’s just a lot.”</p>
<p>1h ago / 3:18 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Gov. Brian Kemp denounces two shootings in one week in Georgia</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/rebecca-cohen-ncpn1307773"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Rebecca Cohen</p></a></p>
<p>"Twice this week, deranged criminals have targeted innocent Georgians," Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp said on X.</p>
<p>He thanked the "brave first responders" who "rushed toward the danger to subdue the shooter and save lives, reminding us of just how crucial they are."</p>
<p>"We ask that you join us in holding them in our prayers, along with those harmed this evening near the CDC Center," he said.</p>
<p>An active-duty soldier <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/georgia-shooting-fort-stewart-army-base-suspect-arrest-what-know-rcna223488">opened fire at an Army post in Georgia</a> on Wednesday, injuring five service members before he was subdued by witnesses and taken into custody, a military official said.</p>
<p>1h ago / 3:15 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">CDC advises employees to immediately get to safety</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/allan-smith-ncpn925861"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_26/3653035/190618-allan-smith.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_26/3653035/190618-allan-smith.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_26/3653035/190618-allan-smith.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Allan Smith</p></a></p>
<p>Reporting from New York</p>
<p>A source shared with NBC News a copy of a Centers for Disease Control and Prevention email to staff advising them to immediately take shelter with the active shooter situation reported near the CDC's campus.</p>
<p>The campus is on lockdown, the email said.</p>
<p>2h ago / 2:54 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Georgia AG 'horrified' by active shooting situation in Atlanta</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/rebecca-cohen-ncpn1307773"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Rebecca Cohen</p></a></p>
<p>Georgia <a href="https://x.com/Georgia_AG/status/1953935197923156233">Attorney General Chris Carr said</a> his office is "horrified" by the active shooter situation on or near Emory's campus and said they are "praying for the safety of the entire campus community."</p>
<p>"We stand ready to assist our law enforcement partners with whatever they may need," Carr added.</p>
<p>2h ago / 2:50 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">FBI assisting in Atlanta</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/tom-winter-ncpn3106"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2025_28/3695992/250708-tom-winter-cs.png 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2025_28/3695992/250708-tom-winter-cs.png 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2025_28/3695992/250708-tom-winter-cs.png"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Tom WinterTom Winter is NBC’s National Law Enforcement and Intelligence Correspondent.</p></a></p>
<p>The FBI is sending agents to assist local law enforcement with the shooting at or near Emory University, spokesperson said.</p>
<p>2h ago / 2:49 PM PDT</p>

<figure></figure><figure></figure><p><a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/now/video/officer-injured-in-reported-shooting-near-emory-university-in-atlanta-244622405732">Officer injured in reported shooting near Emory University in Atlanta</a></p>
<p>02:55</p>
<p>A DeKalb County officer was injured and was en route to Emory University Hospital shortly after the shooting, DeKalb County communications director Dionna Smith said.</p>
<p>Additional details about how the officer was injured, the nature of the officer's injuries and condition were not immediately available.</p>
<p>2h ago / 2:38 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Emory says to shelter in place</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/rebecca-cohen-ncpn1307773"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Rebecca Cohen</p></a></p>
<p>In a new post on X, Emory's Office of Critical Event Preparedness and Response instructed people on campus to shelter in place.</p>
<p>2h ago / 2:29 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Atlanta PD on scene investigating an active shooter</h2>
<figure></figure><p>Juliette Arcodia</p>
<p>The Atlanta Police Department is on the scene investigating an active shooter, police said in a statement.</p>
<p>Information is still being collected as the incident is still unfolding, police said.</p>
<p>A dispatcher at Emory's Office of Critical Event Preparedness and Response (CEPAR) said they didn't have any information to provide at this time as the situation is still active.</p>
<p>2h ago / 2:29 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Emory University less than a mile from the CDC headquarters</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/rebecca-cohen-ncpn1307773"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Rebecca Cohen</p></a></p>
<p>Emory is just minutes away from the headquarters of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention in Atlanta.</p>
<p>Additional information about the situation, including whether either location was targeted, was not immediately clear.</p>
<p>2h ago / 2:29 PM PDT</p>
<figure><img alt="social share icon trigger" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/></figure>
<h2 data-testid="chat-card-headline">Emory sends out campus active shooter alert</h2>
<p><a data-testid="chat-card-byline-link" href="https://www.nbcnews.com/author/rebecca-cohen-ncpn1307773"><figure><picture data-flavor="focal" data-original-height="48" data-original-width="48" data-testid="picture"><source media="(min-width: 320px)" srcset="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_avif,q_auto:eco,dpr_2/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 2x, https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg 1x"/><figure><img alt="" src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_focal-60x60,f_auto,q_auto:best/newscms/2024_41/3665030/241008-rebecca-cohen.jpg"/></figure></picture></figure><p data-testid="chat-card-byline">Rebecca Cohen</p></a></p>
<p>Emory University's Office of Critical Event Preparedness and Response said in a social media alert that there was an active shooter on its Atlanta campus near the Emory Point CVS.</p>
<p>"RUN, HIDE, FIGHT. Avoid the area," the alert said.</p>
<figure></figure><p>NBC News</p>
<p>NBC News</p>
<p>Rebecca Cohen, Phil Helsel, Priya Sridhar and Juliette Arcodia contributed.</p>
